CleanEnergyProject.name: CleanEnergyProject
CleanEnergyProject.description: Represents information about a project that provides credits a company can purchase to claim clean energy usage.

CleanEnergyType.description: The clean energy type associated with the project.

Country.description: The country in which the clean energy project is implemented.

Description.description: The description of the clean energy project.

DeveloperAccountId.description: The account of an organization that develops the clean energy project.

ElectrEmissionsFactorsId.description: The electricity emissions factors record associated with this clean energy project. If there is no value, an emissions rate of 0 tonnes CO2/kWh is used for the project.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the data that is imported for the clean energy project.

FundedBy.description: The name of the organization that's funding the clean energy project.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the project that supplies clean energy.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProjectUrl.description: The URL that contains the clean energy project details.

Region.description: The region within the country where the clean energy project is implemented.
